script.name: tv.bounce.lib.cmd.bounce.nodes
script.description: Lib Cmd: TASK 324: Bounce's cylinder generator, run on enemy ships.

line.comment: * if is a new script version available

* START $null-> call script 'Lib.Gen.RunScriptWhenFinished' : argument1=$name argument2=$task argument3=$task argument4=[THIS] argument5=[THIS] argument6=null argument7=null argument8=null argument9=null argument10=null
* $ship = create ship: type={Neutral Race Navigational Beacon} owner=[Boron] addto=[SECTOR] x=null y=null z=null
* $ship-> set race logic control enabled to [FALSE]

sval.val: Lib Cmd: TASK 324: Bounce's cylinder generator, run on enemy ships.
if is a new script version available

START $null-> call script 'Lib.Gen.RunScriptWhenFinished' : argument1=$name argument2=$task argument3=$task argument4=[THIS] argument5=[THIS] argument6=null argument7=null argument8=null argument9=null argument10=null
$ship = create ship: type={Neutral Race Navigational Beacon} owner=[Boron] addto=[SECTOR] x=null y=null z=null
$ship-> set race logic control enabled to [FALSE]
